title: Flying Burrito Brothers - Avalon Ballroom April 1969
description:
FLYING BURRITO BROTHERS
Live at the Avalon Ballroom 1969

(Released as The Gram Parsons Archives Vol. 1)

Soundboard recordings by Owsley Stanley ("Bear") - I presume the Flying Burrito Brothers were on a bill with the Grateful Dead these nights since Bear was working for (or with) the Dead in this period.

For 40 year old tapes that were not intended for release, these sound really good.

02 Dark End of the Street
03 Undo the Right / Somebody's Back in Town
04 She Once Lived Here

08 Hot Burrito #2
09 Long Black Limousine

11 Sin City
